ModMetaData.name: VCE - RimCuisine 2 Core
ModMetaData.author: Oreno
ModMetaData.description:
Vanilla Cooking Expanded already works alongside RimCuisine 2 Core but only with renamed items. This patch restores renamed items and make it work together.
Changes - Changed back VCE items name and artwork. - Removed all duplicate items on the RimCuisine side. - Removed VCE Flour and Sugar but the RimCuisine version used its texture. - Flour and Sugar used RimCuisine mechanism. - Removed Agave Nectar (RimCuisine). - Pawn now can eat Agave Nectar and Sugar when desperate for food. - VCE cheese category under RimCuisine processed animal product category. - Added standalone Brown Sugar with unused VCE texture. - RimCuisine items can be used for VCE meal recipe. - VCE research will require RimCuisine research. - Renamed RimCuisine 2 category to "Cooking". - VCE building items moved to Cooking category.
